body:
Comment 3: 
That's because the body of H is inlined in G() as inlining is enabled by default.

if you disable inlining by using "go build -gcflags -l " to build your program,
the H() frame should be present.

Please refrain from commenting on closed issue when you don't have valid
reasonings to re-open the issue.

Please use the mailing lists to ask questions like this. Thank you.
